item.title: Lecture 2: What is Economics? + Four Core Principles
item.description: Summary Economics gives you a toolkit to study choices and solve problems What is Economics? Economics is simply the study of choices. It uses rational and analytic thinking along with scientific techniques to analyse choices across a variety of topics The study of Economics gives you a toolkit to approaching, understanding, and solving problems Four Core Principles of Economics Although Economics is a vast field that encompassed all sorts of decision analysis and problem solving, it is often encompassed into Four Core Principles
